name: DistrictDefense [IOS]
description:
Your district is under attack by the opponent gang.

You must defend your neighbourhood. Select your best gang members and fight to claim back your territories.

District Defense is a tactical defence game.

How to Play:

-Every eliminated enemy will gain you extra money
-Wisely use your money
-You can drag and drop or just select your unit buttın and click the grid where you want to place your selected unit
-You have story mode and endless survival mode

Enjoy!
